entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 80S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
PATCHY FOG AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

PATCHY FOG IN THE MORNING
MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
LOWS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS AROUND 80
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
